keyword: calories in a chicken tikka masala
title: Calories in a Chicken Tikka Masala
meta_description: Discover calories in a chicken tikka masala serving, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown, and preparation tweaks for better choices.
h1: Calories in a Chicken Tikka Masala
assumptions: Standard restaurant serving (~350 g), boneless chicken in tomato-cream sauce with onions, garlic, ginger, spices; no rice, naan, or sides included.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, restaurant, portion size, cream content, and cooking method. Check menus or labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One serving of chicken tikka masala provides ~700 kcal and ~40 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged or restaurant info.

tweaks.label: Serve with 1 cup cooked basmati rice
Use yogurt instead of cream for lower fat
Add 1 tbsp ghee for extra richness

faqs.q: How many calories in a chicken tikka masala?
faqs.a: About 700 kcal per standard 350 g serving.

faqs.q: Is chicken tikka masala high in protein?
faqs.a: Yes, ~40 g protein per serving from the chicken.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in chicken tikka masala?
faqs.a: Around 50 g total fat, with 20 g saturated from the creamy sauce.

faqs.q: Does chicken tikka masala have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, ~1200 mg per serving due to spices and seasoning.

faqs.q: How to make chicken tikka masala lower calorie?
faqs.a: Substitute cream with yogurt or coconut milk to reduce fat and calories by up to 150 kcal.
